0.1: Throws things that go boom when they hit things! Performs up to 3 explosive attacks, dealing <pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</pyro>.

1.1: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina and deals <pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</pyro> to opponents after a short casting time.

2.1: Gathering the power of Pyro, Klee plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals <pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</pyro> upon impact with the ground.

field.0: Jumpy Dumpty is tons of boom-bang-fun!
field.1: When thrown, Jumpy Dumpty bounces thrice, igniting and dealing AoE Pyro DMG with every bounce.
field.3: On the third bounce, the bomb splits into many mines.
field.4: The mines will explode upon contact with opponents, or after a short period of time, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.
field.8: Jumpy Dumpty is Klee's good friend! She can't help but introduce him to everyone.

field.0: Klee's Blazing Delight! For the duration of this ability, continuously summons Sparks 'n' Splash to attack nearby opponents, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.
field.2: The knights all believe that Klee must have a lucky star watching over her to have never been hurt by any of her own bombs...

field.0: When Jumpy Dumpty and Normal Attacks deal DMG, Klee has a 50% chance to obtain an Explosive Spark.
field.1: This Explosive Spark is consumed by the next Charged Attack, which costs no Stamina and deals 50% increased DMG.

field.0: When Klee's Charged Attack results in a CRIT Hit, all party members gain 2 Elemental Energy.
Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Mondstadt on the mini-map.

0.0: Attacks and Skills have a certain chance to summon sparks that bombard opponents, dealing DMG equal to 120% of Sparks 'n' Splash's DMG.

1.0: Being hit by Jumpy Dumpty's mines decreases opponents' DEF by 23% for 10s.

2.0: Increases the Level of Jumpy Dumpty by 3.

3.0: If Klee leaves the field during the duration of Sparks 'n' Splash, her departure triggers an explosion that deals 555% of her ATK as AoE Pyro DMG.

4.0: Increases the Level of Sparks 'n' Splash by 3.

5.0: While under the effects of Sparks 'n' Splash, Klee will regenerate 3 Energy for all members of the party (excluding Klee) every 3s.
5.1: When Sparks 'n' Splash is used, all party members will gain a 10% Pyro DMG Bonus for 25s.
